methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc: createApplication method called at creation, initializes some globalKey values

args.name: creatingContract
args.desc: ApplicationID for the creator contract (CaelusAdminContract)

args.name: operatorAddress
args.desc: Address of the node operator used to sign online/offline txns and participate in auctions

args.name: contractVersion
args.desc: Approval Program version for the node contract, stored in the CaelusAdminContract

args.name: tokenId
args.desc: AssetID of the LST token

methods.name: addToOperatorCommit
methods.desc: followup operation called by the Caelus Admin to send the correct amount into the operator commit

args.name: opStake
args.desc: node operator stake commitment

methods.name: removeFromOperatorCommit
methods.desc: Used by the node operator to remove from his stake amount for the node

args.name: claimRequest
args.desc: amount claimed by the node operator to be removed from the operator_commit counter and moved into delegated stake

args.name: claimRequestLST
args.desc: amount of LST to be sent back to the node operator

methods.name: solveDelinquency
methods.desc:
Delinquent Validators need to propose a valid block to clear up their delinquency status.


This method should be called when the delinquency score is below the threshold and the operator has proposed a block.

args.name: block
args.desc: block number of the block proposed by the node operator while the account was in delinquency

methods.name: reportRewards
methods.desc: Called by the node operator to report the rewards of a block proposed by the contract account.

args.name: block
args.desc: Block number of the block proposed by the node operator

methods.name: addStake
methods.desc:
FOLLOWUP OPERATION CALLED BY THE CAELUS ADMIN TO SEND THE DELEGATED STAKE TO THE NODE OPERATOR


Receive delegated stake and update the delegation factors.

args.name: txnWithStake
args.desc: Payment transaction to the contract account with the delegated stake

methods.name: burnStake
methods.desc: FOLLOWUP OPERATION CALLED BY THE CAELUS ADMIN TO CLAWBACK THE DELEGATED STAKE ON BURN OPERATION

args.name: amountRequested
args.desc: amount of Algo to be burned

args.name: receiverBurn
args.desc: address of the receiver of the burn transaction triggered on the Caelus Admin contract

methods.name: snitchValidator
methods.desc: Snitch another Validator Contract. A valid snitch will improve the performance counter.

args.name: appToSnitch
args.desc: ApplicationID of the validator to be snitched

args.name: params
args.desc: parameters to check for the validator (For example: performanceCheck, stakeAmountCheck, delinquentCheck, versionCheck)

methods.name: goOnline
methods.desc: Used to set the Contract account online for consensus. Always check that account is online and incentivesEligible before having delegatable stake

args.name: feePayment
args.desc: Payment transaction to the contract to cover costs for Eligibility fee 0 for renewal.

args.name: votePK
args.desc: The vote public key

args.name: selectionPK
args.desc: The selection public key

args.name: stateProofPK
args.desc: the state proof public key

args.name: voteFirst
args.desc: Index of first valid block for the participation keys

args.name: voteLast
args.desc: Index of last valid block for for the participation keys

args.name: voteKeyDilution
args.desc: The vote key dilution value

methods.name: goOffline
methods.desc:
Set the contract account to offline so that it doesn't participate in consensus anymore.
No force offline by the protocol (might be changed to a very long time wait in case the node isn't proposing blocks at all). Lookup Delinquency status
Once the account is set offline the method ensures that it cannot be delegated to.

methods.name: migrateToPool
methods.desc: Migrate the validator pool to a new pool. Useful to migrate this validator pool to a new version of the contract without losing the state.

args.name: newPool
args.desc: ApplicationID of the new pool to migrate to

methods.name: mergeStateOnMigration
methods.desc: FOLLOWUP OPERATION Receiving call from the old pool to merge the state into the new pool.

methods.name: claimLeftAlgo
methods.desc: Used by anyone to clear up remaining Algo outside of stake counters back to the Caelus Admin contract to be redistributed

methods.name: deleteApplication
methods.desc: Node operator can close the Validator and get back his stake. Delegated stake is put back into the Caelus Admin contract.
